description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Squid is a pacifist's nightmare. You're a cargo ship trapped in a warzone! Test your piloting skills by navigating through hailstorms of bullets and redirecting them back into foes in this top down "shooter". Filled with baddies, powerups, and jaw-dropping particle effects, this game is a perfect example of how the best offense might be a good defense.
description.short: Squid is a pacifist's nightmare. You're a cargo ship trapped in a warzone! Test your piloting skills by navigating through hailstorms of bullets and redirecting them back into foes in this top down "shooter". Filled with baddies, powerups, and jaw-dropping particle effects, this game is a perfect example of how the best offense might be a good defense.
